001package com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.contracts;
002
003import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.client.service.model.Challenge;
004import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Claim;
005import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.ClaimReference;
006import com.pingidentity.did.sdk.types.Share;
007import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.errors.WalletException;
008import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.PresentationRequest;
009import com.pingidentity.sdk.pingonewallet.types.WalletEvents.WalletEvent;
010
011import java.util.List;
012
013@SuppressWarnings("SameReturnValue")
014public interface WalletCallbackHandler {
015
016    /**
017     * Handle the newly issued credential.
018     *
019     * @param issuer    ApplicationInstanceID of the credential issuer
020     * @param message   Optional string message
021     * @param challenge Optional challenge
022     * @param claim     Issued credential
023     * @param errors    List of any errors while processing/verifying the credential
024     * @return True if you'd like to accept the credential
025     * False if you'd like to reject the credential
026     */
027    boolean handleCredentialIssuance(String issuer, String message, Challenge challenge, Claim claim, List<WalletException> errors);
028
029    /**
030     * Handle the revocation of a credential.
031     *
032     * @param issuer         ApplicationInstanceID of the credential issuer
033     * @param message        Optional string message
034     * @param challenge      Optional challenge
035     * @param claimReference ClaimReference for the revoked credential
036     * @param errors         List of any errors that occurred while revoking the credential
037     */
038    boolean handleCredentialRevocation(String issuer, String message, Challenge challenge, ClaimReference claimReference, List<WalletException> errors);
039
040    /**
041     * This callback is triggered when another wallet shares a credential with the current application instance.
042     *
043     * @param sender    ApplicationInstanceID of the sender
044     * @param message   Optional string message
045     * @param challenge Optional challenge
046     * @param claim     Shared credential
047     * @param errors    List of any errors that occurred while sharing the credential
048     */
049    void handleCredentialPresentation(String sender, String message, Challenge challenge, List<Share> claim, List<WalletException> errors);
050
051    /**
052     * This callback is triggered when PingOneWalletClientContract.processQrContent is called and the URL represents a Verifiable Presentation request.
053     *
054     * @param presentationRequest Request for presenting Claims from wallet
055     */
056    void handleCredentialRequest(PresentationRequest presentationRequest);
057
058    /**
059     * This callback is triggered when the SDK runs into any errors while processing the events/messages.
060     *
061     * @param error
062     *
063     * This method is deprecated and will be removed in upcoming updates. Use handleEvent instead
064     */
065    void handleError(WalletException error);
066
067    /**
068     * Callback returns different events while using Wallet, including errors
069     * Call super.handleEvent() if you're still using `handleError` callback to manage exceptions.
070     *
071     * @param event
072     */
073    void handleEvent(WalletEvent event);
074}
